hanzi-su-wiki:
抜

Значения

Пропускать, опускать; вынимать, удалять, пропускать, превосходить, отбирать; допускать оплошность; выниматься, быть пропущенным, не хватать, проходить насквозь

Мнемоника

На собак не надевали ошейник, но привязывали за ногу к палке. Стремиться вытащить 扌 ногу, освободиться. Справа — привязанная собака 犬.

Варианты

拔
purpleculture_pinyin:
bá
Japanese variant of 拔
Японский вариант 拔
rtega_mnemonic:
拔拔RS
抜抜		uproot, pull out
  • hand 扌 pulling the dog 犮
  • modf. 拔 → 抜
  • ⓢ hand 扌 pulling hands 友
heisig_constituent: slip out, finger, fingers, friend, woman, crotch
Keyword_KANJIDIC: slip out, extract, pull out, pilfer, quote, remove, omit
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: выскользнуть, экстракт, вытащить, стянуть, цитирую, удалить, Omit
koohiiStory1: Don´t let good friends slip out between your fingers.
koohiiStory2: Imagine a cliché Hollywood situation: one person is lying on the edge of the abyss and another (presumably his friend) is hanging, only thing holding him is the grip of their hands. Then fingers slip out of the grip and he falls in said abyss.
kunYomi: ぬ.く、-ぬ.く、ぬ.き、ぬ.ける、ぬ.かす、ぬ.かる
jp_example_words:
海抜(かいばつ): height above sea level
抜かす(ぬかす): to omit, to leave out
抜け出す(ぬけだす): to slip out, to sneak away, to excel
抜く(ぬく): extract, omit, surpass, draw out, unplug
抜ける(ぬける): come out, fall out, be omitted, be missing, escape
jp_readingExamples: 抜かす (ぬ.かす), 抜かる (ぬ.かる), 抜く (ぬ.く), 抜ける (ぬ.ける)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Touch your fingers to your friend to extract their friendship. Extract it with a high five. Extract it with a back rub. Extract it with an, "Oh no, there's some lint on your shirt, let me get that for you."
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: REMINDER: You are not allowed to touch any of your friends without their permission. If they say no to extracting, then you don't get to touch. End of story.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your friend looks you in the eye and says, I want you to extract my clothes. I want to be nude (ぬ). Now you have to use your fingers on your friend to extract their clothes to help them be nude.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: REMINDER: If someone asks you to extract their clothes to help them be nude, you don't have to do it unless you also want to! Choices and respect, people!
Ru_Meaning: slip out, extract, pull out, pilfer, quote, remove, omit
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 又 (опять), 夂 (зима), 扎
Kanshudo_mnemonic: your hand (扌) is in your friend's (友) but you extract it

bá
яп. вм. 拔
Radicals: 扌, 友  (fingers, friend)
Meaning Mnemonic
Touch your fingers to your friend to extract their friendship. Extract it with a high five. Extract it with a back rub. Extract it with an, "Oh no, there's some lint on your shirt, let me get that for you."
REMINDER: You are not allowed to touch any of your friends without their permission. If they say no to extracting, then you don't get to touch. End of story.
Reading Mnemonic
Your friend looks you in the eye and says, I want you to extract my clothes. I want to be nude (ぬ). Now you have to use your fingers on your friend to extract their clothes to help them be nude.
REMINDER: If someone asks you to extract their clothes to help them be nude, you don't have to do it unless you also want to! Choices and respect, people!
